name: Nash
headline: The easiest way for any business to offer delivery
description: Nash makes it easy for businesses to offer same-day delivery. We do this by building business workflows on top of delivery APIs (like Doordash, Uber, Skipcart). For example, a local dry-cleaning business can start offering pickup and dropoff service at a customer’s desired time without operating their own fleet.

founders.name: Mahmoud Ghulman, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder at Nash. Prior to Nash, I founded a gig-worker parking logistics company and led Business Development at Mozn - where we developed AI solutions in AML, stock-market fraud, and credit scores in finance & insurance. I received my Bachelors in Physics from MIT.

I love spending time with family at the beach, scuba-diving with Aziz, and playing tennis.

founders.name: Aziz Alghunaim, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder at Nash. Prior to Nash, I spent a couple of years building Tarjimly (YC W18), a mobile application to connect refugees with real, volunteer translators all over the world. Before that, I was a software engineer at Palantir working on a number of high-volume data problems. I received my Bachelors and Masters in Computer Science in 2015 from MIT.

I love mission-driven work that is coupled with great technical execution. I am in the Bay Area, and love meeting new people, so say hello :)

# Delivery infrastructure for last-mile logistics
Nash is the leading platform for managing, orchestrating, and scaling complex last-mile delivery operations
[Get a Demo](https://www.usenash.com/</demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66eb204c7c6e5363512234eb_Group.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66eb204c2fbb991b092ab757_Group-1.svg)
Helping innovative companies scale their delivery operations
![7-eleven](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66e47cc0b27ec8d0e4c5554c_Frame.png)
![Loblaws](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66e47cc0b1e01a7d2aeb2e9e_Frame-1.png)
![Alto Pharmacy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66e47cc01b734ab865935246_Frame-2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/678b0178e6dac2365fc7fee3_walmart.png)
![Square](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66e47cc01bbb11b76b97da86_Frame-4.png)
![woolworths](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66e47cc05e6641047b6db119_Frame-5.png)

![Loblaws](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66e47cc0b1e01a7d2aeb2e9e_Frame-1.png)
![Alto Pharmacy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66e47cc01b734ab865935246_Frame-2.png)
![ez caler](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66e47cc0c6241af8ac9084cb_Frame-3.png)
![Square](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66e47cc01bbb11b76b97da86_Frame-4.png)
![woolworths](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66e47cc05e6641047b6db119_Frame-5.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/678aef6ee19da16bdc3e06da_66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1_6772df38d7d5b8e47faa7195_animation-proactive-support-transcode.gif)
Introducing Nash AI
Smarter decisions, streamlined operations, and better delivery outcomes. Nash AI brings together AI logistics agents and full-context intelligence to every delivery workflow.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/6772d3490341c1946807eff9_ai-icon-dark.svg)](https://www.usenash.com/</nash-ai>)
## Meet your **last** last-mile solution
Nash sets the standard for the last-mile with an end-to-end platform built to transform the way businesses manage delivery operations
[Workflow OptimizationAutomate and streamline dispatch rules across local delivery and shipping for top delivery performance![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4894b3aec0251ae4a457b/66ed93e4293a21554d5cd6dc_Frame%201171275262.jpg)](https://www.usenash.com/</platform/workflow-optimization>)
[Fleet ManagementSeamlessly integrate and manage internal and external fleets![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4894b3aec0251ae4a457b/66ed940fbffe3047db248308_Frame%201171275258.jpg)](https://www.usenash.com/</platform/fleet-management>)
[OrchestrationSynchronize across fleets and resources for peak delivery performance![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4894b3aec0251ae4a457b/66ed941f40a9ad16b62ea4fd_01-1.jpg)](https://www.usenash.com/</platform/orchestration>)
[Check OutTransform your check out experience with dynamic, data-driven delivery options![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4894b3aec0251ae4a457b/66ed944a40a9ad16b62ee01f_Frame%201171275272.jpg)](https://www.usenash.com/</platform/check-out>)
[Internal OperationsSee everything, everywhere, all at once for better control and visibility![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4894b3aec0251ae4a457b/66ed946033aa968e47fd504d_01.jpg)](https://www.usenash.com/</platform/internal-operations>)
[Customer EngagementBuild a world-class delivery experience for your customers![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4894b3aec0251ae4a457b/66ed9472b9f71844b284394f_04.jpg)](https://www.usenash.com/</platform/customer-engagement>)
[AnalyticsTurn insights into action with advanced analytics and performance metrics![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4894b3aec0251ae4a457b/6706b76b4295eb71d656fa89_reliabilityscore.svg)](https://www.usenash.com/</platform/analytics>)
### Talk to our team of logistics experts
Learn how Nash delivers flexibility and control across the last mile
[Get a Demo](https://www.usenash.com/</demo>)
## One platform for all delivery types
[Learn why Nash is the leading last-mile platform](https://www.usenash.com/</why-nash>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/67080b9057399bf5a93d3244_Frame%201171275310.svg)
## Built for modern commerce
The Nash platform provides unmatched control and modularity, enabling businesses across industries to meet diverse and unique fulfillment needs

[](https://www.usenash.com/</solutions/grocery>)

## Solutions for every stakeholder of the delivery journey
Across millions of deliveries, Nash has driven impact across fleets, internal teams, and customers—demonstrated by the proven success of businesses that use our platform as essential infrastructure for their last-mile operations‍
Fleets
500+ delivery fleets partner with Nash across the globe. Businesses can access these fleets and add them to their delivery operations, and onboard and manage their existing fleets, all on the Nash platform.
[See Fleet Management](https://www.usenash.com/</platform/fleet-management>)
15%
Increase in delivery success through optimized, automated fleet management
Internal Teams
Nash streamlines and automates internal processes, enabling teams to efficiently manage delivery workflows. With real-time data visibility, teams can ensure seamless coordination, reduce operational burdens, and continuously boost performance.
[See Internal Operations](https://www.usenash.com/</platform/internal-operations>)
1000+ hours
Saved through through streamlined delivery operations
Customers
Dynamic delivery options, return management, and customizable, real-time tracking set the new standard for exceeding customer expectations while driving satisfaction and brand loyalty.
[See Customer Engagement](https://www.usenash.com/</platform/customer-engagement>)
5+ points
Increase in NPS as a result of delivery performance and our suite of customer engagement tools
## Powering millions of deliveries across the globe
15 countries and counting
500+ delivery partners globally
Supports multi-market operations
![Earth](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e4310c9bf35128b63c25c1/66ead992925d75303e4d03b3_Group%201171274850.png)

generated_description:
Nash is a San Francisco-based company founded in 2021 and a proud member of Y Combinator’s S21 batch. Their mission? It’s straightforward—Nash aims to be the easiest way for businesses to offer delivery services, initially focusing on same-day delivery.

At its core, Nash operates by creating business workflows that integrate with existing delivery APIs like DoorDash, Uber, and Skipcart. This means that businesses, such as local dry cleaners, can effortlessly provide pickup and drop-off services without the need to manage their own delivery fleet. They’re taking the complexity out of logistics, allowing businesses to focus on what they do best.

With a team of 31 employees and under the guidance of Group Partner Michael Seibel, Nash has positioned itself as a leader in last-mile logistics. Their platform includes various solutions such as workflow optimization, fleet management, orchestration of deliveries, and customer engagement analytics. These tools are designed to streamline delivery operations and improve performance at every touchpoint, from internal processes to customer experiences.

Nash supports a range of businesses—from grocery and retail to restaurants and pharmacies—enabling them to scale their delivery operations effectively. The company touts a hefty network of over 500 delivery fleets globally, providing them the flexibility to meet their unique fulfillment needs. It’s not just about improving delivery; it's about transforming how logistics operate at a foundational level.

Moreover, Nash has introduced AI logistics agents to assist businesses in refining their delivery workflows further. They emphasize the importance of data-driven insights and performance metrics for businesses looking to excel in the competitive delivery space.

In essence, Nash is powering millions of deliveries across multiple markets and is committed to providing security and compliance at its core. If you’re in the business of delivery, you might want to check out what Nash offers—it's designed to be the last piece of the puzzle in the last-mile logistics landscape.

For more information, visit their website: [Nash](https://www.usenash.com/).
